Show THL color names

colornames_thl.Rd

Shows the predefined names of colors.

colornames_thl(lang = c("fi", "en"), include.secondary = FALSE)

Arguments

lang

Language of names fetched
include.secondary

Should the additional colors be shown? Quantitative and two-way color palettes have additional colors predefined. Names of such might not be informative and they should not be used alone.

Examples

colornames_thl("fi")
#>  [1] "thl.vihrea"          "tumma.vihrea"        "tumma.harmaa"       
#>  [4] "teksti"              "keski.harmaa"        "vaalea.harmaa"      
#>  [7] "tausta.harmaa"       "oranssi"             "tumma.oranssi"      
#> [10] "punainen"            "rubiini"             "pinkki"             
#> [13] "roosa"               "tumma.violetti"      "vaalea.vihrea"      
#> [16] "turkoosi"            "tumma.turkoosi"      "syaani.sininen"     
#> [19] "petrooli"            "sininen"             "tumma.sininen"      
#> [22] "hiekka"              "vaalea.turkoosi"     "sarja.vihrea.k.2"   
#> [25] "sarja.vihrea.k.3"    "sarja.vihrea.k.4"    "sarja.vihrea.k.5"   
#> [28] "sarja.vihrea.k.6"    "sarja.sininen.k.2"   "sarja.sininen.k.3"  
#> [31] "sarja.sininen.k.4"   "sarja.sininen.k.5"   "sarja.sininen.k.6"  
#> [34] "sarja.rubiini.k.2"   "sarja.rubiini.k.3"   "sarja.rubiini.k.4"  
#> [37] "sarja.rubiini.k.5"   "sarja.rubiini.k.6"   "sarja.vihrea.t.2"   
#> [40] "sarja.vihrea.t.3"    "sarja.vihrea.t.4"    "sarja.vihrea.t.5"

#> [67] "sarja.vihrea.vh.3"   "sarja.vihrea.vh.4"  
colornames_thl("en")
#>  [1] "thl.green"            "dark.green"           "dark.gray"
